Transcript: Michelle: Yoo-hoo.
Danny: Hey.

Michelle: Hi, sweetie. You forgot your lunch.

Danny: It's okay, honey, you can drop the 
act. The surveillance cameras aren't functioning yet.

Michelle: Wow. So this is it: The secure 
room.

Danny: Can you close the door? How'd you get 
past security?

Michelle: Oh, I’m married to the head of

Danny: That's not good. I've got to look into

Michelle: That's what I’m here for.

Danny: Okay, well, this here, this is in

Michelle: It gives new meaning to putting all

Danny: Yeah, well, the theory is that the 
more that you spread information around, the more potential leaks you have.

Michelle: So, what is it you want me to do?

Danny: Okay, well, I think that this is going

Cassie: Alonzo.

about, my people.

Cassie: Richard, there's been talk...

Cassie:...About ripping out the commercial

Richard: Oh, right. I know.
Cassie: Oh, so you've seen it.

Richard: Well, I haven't seen this memo, but

Alonzo: And you're fine with all of it.

Richard: Well, Alonzo, I do realize-- and I

Alonzo: I understand what they're after here.

Alonzo: It's going to be a disaster for all

Alonzo: And the rich get richer. You know

Richard: I try not to take a cynical view.

Cassie: You know, Richard, maybe this is the

Cassie: Maybe we should talk to the people

Alonzo: Yeah. I like that speech a lot

Richard: No. No. Absolutely not.

Alan: Excellent. That's exactly what I want. Keep me informed on that. Well, I

Olivia: Guess again.

Alan: Oh, now, Olivia, are we going to play

Olivia: I know what you did, and I don't

Alan: What I did?

Olivia: You deliberately left your money clip

Alan: Deliberately?

Olivia: And when Josh found it-- which you

Phillip: I think I'll let you tell me. My

Felicia: Reva, I don't want to get

Reva: That's it. Jack Robechaux was in

Felicia: It is one thing to explore your own

Reva: Maybe... Maybe I was supposed to pass

Felicia: Reva, be careful. You might be

Reva: I'm looking for answers, Felicia. And

Felicia: You know the conference was just an

Reva: Ah. So now I’m a case study.

Felicia: And a friend. I'm just not ready to

Reva: Maybe. But you don't think I'm nuts?

Felicia: No, I don't think you're nuts. I 
think you're just dealing with some serious issues that have caused you these

Reva: Yeah, well, all I can say is whatever 
business this is, it's creating more problems than it's solving, and I’m feeling

because there's something that I’m supposed to be doing.
Felicia: Any idea what?
Reva: Maybe.
Olivia: Well, don't try and impress me with your... Self- control.
Alan: I can outlast Josh.
Olivia: Really? In what way?

Alan: In every way. And when he's crushed and 
plowed under with salt, you will have no choice but to come to me, and I will be

Olivia: And what is that?

Alan: A man who appreciates you for who you

Olivia: Josh appreciates me. He tells me so 
all the time.

Alan: Josh appreciates the part you allow him 
to see, not the part that you keep hidden deep down inside, the part that you

Olivia: (Scoffs) you don't know Josh like I 
do.

Alan: Oh, I know Josh a lot better than you 
think, and he wants a wife to fit into a certain ideal, a wife that behaves

Olivia: Oh. And you have no standards?

Alan: On the contrary. I just meet very few

Olivia: Stay away from my husband.
Alan: That's up to you.
Olivia: I'm warning you, Alan.

Alan: Warning me? That sounds more like a

Olivia: You're not the only person who can

Alan: If I can't make you love me, I can make

Danny: It is okay Phillip’s just doing his

Phillip: So you're telling me you intended 
this.

Danny: You're missing the point. Phillip, I

Phillip: This was a test?
Danny: That's what I'm trying to tell you.

Gus: Actually, um... Actually, Mr. Spaulding, 
it is standard operational procedure to run a test to see if you can crack your

Phillip: (Laughs nervously) okay. Don't I

Danny: Be my guest. It's fine.

Danny: You took the film out of the camera. 
Okay, I'll bite: What's your game, Aitoro?
